hero.subtitle: Find your place in the evolving world.

classes.title: Yoga Classes
classes.subtitle: Step into the flow following the guidance of our expert teachers. We offer a variety of yoga styles such as Vinyasa, Hatha, Kundalini and Aerial Yoga - so that everyone can find what they need. See you on the mat!

quote.text: What you may become is inconsequential in comparison to what you already are.
